titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Zenon V. Adamich papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Lyalya Kharitonova

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-05-11T16:11-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: May 2015: Revised after circulation 2013: Added container list

did.abstract: Writings, lists, memoranda, and printed matter, relating to Yugoslav naval operations and relations with the Allies during World War II, Slovene territorial claims in 1941, and decisions concerning Yugoslavia made at the Yalta Conference.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Zenon V. Adamich papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1972.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Zenon V. Adamich was a commander of the Royal Yugoslav Navy, commanding officer of Naval Base A, Alexandria, Egypt, and senior Yugoslav Naval officer in the Middle East from 1944 to 1945.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Writings, lists, memoranda, and printed matter, relating to Yugoslav naval operations and relations with the Allies during World War II, Slovene territorial claims in 1941, and decisions concerning Yugoslavia made at the Yalta Conference.

did.unittitle: "Zbornik zavoda za povijesne znanosti ostrazivackog centra Jugoslavenske Akademile Znanosti i Umjetnosti," Volumen 10, Zagreb
"War on the Yugoslav Coast (Civil War 1991/92)," by Milan Vego
"The Diary of a Submariner in WWII," by John de Majnik
"Royal Yugoslav Navy in World War II," compiled from official records by Zenon V. Adamich
"Rank List of Comissioned Officers of the Royal Yugoslav Navy on April 6, 1941,"
Slovene territorial claims after WW II, memoranda and correspondence
